title: Retro Arcade Rotterdam
description: A nostalgic arcade featuring classic games from the 80s and 90s.

title: Gamestate Rotterdam
description: A modern arcade with the latest games and VR experiences, located near the Blaak area.

title: Arcade Funland
description: A family-friendly arcade offering a variety of games for all ages, situated near Zuidplein shopping center.

title: Pixel Palace
description: An arcade by the harbor with a wide selection of both new and retro games.

title: Game World Rotterdam
description: Located near De Kuip stadium, this arcade offers a mix of video games and classic arcade machines.

title: Noord Arcade
description: A hidden gem in the Rotterdam Noord area, featuring a variety of arcade games and pinball machines.

title: Oostplein Gameroom
description: Located at Oostplein, this arcade offers a wide range of games and entertainment options.

title: Kralingen Arcade
description: Popular among students, this arcade offers affordable gaming options and a fun atmosphere.

title: Coolhaven Arcade
description: A great place to enjoy a variety of arcade games in a modern setting.

title: Schiebroek Arcade
description: Known for its extensive collection of games and friendly staff, located in the Schiebroek district.
